column5: Was able to get out a couple of times this week and found some Kings......this is the best of the bunch.  Tightlines!!!
yah...thassa nice one...too bad the fish didn't check the calendar
Nice one, is that a lamprey mark on it?
Yup Young Jedi - a lamprey indeed.  LMK when you want to hit the big water....  :-)
AHHHHHHHHHH there is never a bad time to catch a nice salmon like that ...good practice for the bigger ones your going to catch during the derby....  Good Luck
Well done, caught my first ever king last week and am now a convert.  Will see you on the water for the next two months chasing these things.
THat was a derby king for sure.
Great looking king TnL A real beauty for sure!!! Leechman
